findings.title: Differentiate functions and events by names
findings.description: Favor capitalization and a prefix in front of events (we suggest Log), to prevent the risk of confusion between functions and events.

findings.title: Variable type declarations should be consistent
findings.description: Ensure consistency in variable type declarations to maintain code quality and prevent potential issues.

findings.title: Small gas optimisation (massNotify)
findings.description: Assigning `_owner.length` to a local variable costs more than directly using the array length.

findings.title: Log transaction ID on adding deposit
findings.description: Logging only investor address and current transaction amount is insufficient; suggest logging the transaction ID also.

findings.title: None found
findings.description: No major or critical issues were identified during the audit.
